bibl.title: The Tetradrachms of Roman Egypt. Second Edition.
bibl.note: 1e éd.: Chicago, 1957 [1969]. Two monographs by J.G. MILNE are printed as supplements: The Currency of Egypt in the Fifth Century, NC 5th S., 6 (1926) pp. 43-92; The Leaden Token-Coinage of Egypt under the Romans, NC 4th S., 8 (1908) 24 pp. et pl. XXII. - Non vidimus. Cf. NL 124 (1990) p. 21, No. 127.
CURTIS James W., The Tetradrachms of Roman Egypt. Second Edition.
New York, S.J. Durst, 1990, 8°, 416 pp., pll. ISBN 0-942666-61-5.
